headline: Here's A Conservative Way To Take Advantage Of Bullish Axon Stock
summary: Traders looking for a more conservative way to play a prospering Axon stock through options could use a bull put spread.

headline: Buy Axon, avoid Byrna: Good Buy or Goodbye
summary: Tematica Research chief investment officer Chris Versace joins Market Domination with Josh Lipton to explain why he suggests buying Axon (AXON) and avoiding Byrna (BYRN). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: S&P Futures Gain With Focus on Earnings and Fed Speak
summary: September S&P 500 E-Mini futures (ESU25) are trending up +0.24% this morning as investors digested U.S. President Donald Trump’s latest tariff threats and weak economic data, with the focus now shifting to a fresh batch of corporate earnings reports and remarks from Federal Reserve officials.
